original_title: Per vivere meglio, divertitevi con noi
overview: For having suffered the violence of seven Himalayan Sherpas, the Countess Valentina Contarini has fallen ill of "fallophobia" and consults a healer, a supposed extraterrestrial who is actually a young Swedish man who "works" for certain American psychologists.
title: Per vivere meglio, divertitevi con noi
